descriptions.primary: Revolutionizing the way you transport your agricultural machines

agreements.accept_policy_and_terms: I agree to the <use>Terms of Use</use> and confirm that I have read the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
agreements.terms_of_use_info_1: By accessing or using the site, you agree to comply with the Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
agreements.terms_of_use_info_2: The materials contained on this site are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.
agreements.terms_of_use_info_3: For more information on how we use your data, visit the <link>terms of use</link> page on our platform.
agreements.privacy_policy_info_1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Agrofast policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect on the Agrofast site and other sites we own and operate.
agreements.privacy_policy_info_2: We only request personal information when we truly need it to provide you with a service. We do so by fair and legal means, with your knowledge and consent. We also inform you why we are collecting it and how it will be used.
agreements.privacy_policy_info_3: For more information on how we use your data, visit the <link>privacy policy</link> page on our platform.
agreements.sign_in_terms: By continuing, we will send a verification code to the provided number. Data and messaging rates may apply.
agreements.login_terms: By continuing, we will send a verification code to the provided number. Data and messaging rates may apply.
agreements.mailing_list: I would like to receive promotional emails from Agrofast.
agreements.cookie_use_warning_description: Our application uses cookies to improve user experience. By continuing to browse, you agree to the use of cookies.
agreements.cookie_use_warning_disclaimer: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help remember your preferences and login information, making your experience more personalized and efficient.
